segments.text: I observe the angled view of the kitchen counter and sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes the plate with concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unseen by her, water pours over the sink rim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a puddle that's growing fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, but she doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the boy climbs the stool unsteadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches for the cookie jar inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spill out as he grabs them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief brings a smile despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is beautifully calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the interior mess angers me a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Slippery floors and tipping stools are no joke.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it all ends without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR
